title: kanakamayura
sahitya:
kanaka mayUra gamana gambhIra kAruNya kumAra kali tIr udAra



anupallavi



anagha vEl vIrA arumukha mArA ghana maNi tigazh alaivAi shendUra



caraNam



anjal enraruL abhaya karatala shen kamala vimala varada kara kamala

ranjitakara vimala jalArNava kavi kunjaradAsanimala kamala hrtvAsa
